snippet: KRISILOFF--Barbara. March 4,1936-June 12, 2016 Predeceased by her parents Joseph and Mary. A real New Yorker to the end. May her memory be a blessing. Graveside Service Tuesday, June 14, 3pm Old Montefiore. YFS, Love, Cousin Faith 1/3
lead_paragraph: KRISILOFF--Barbara. March 4,1936-June 12, 2016 Predeceased by her parents Joseph and Mary. A real New Yorker to the end. May her memory be a blessing. Graveside Service Tuesday, June 14, 3pm Old Montefiore. YFS, Love, Cousin Faith 1/3
